com.versant.util.backup
Class BackupVisitor

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.util.backup.BackupVisitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
RollforwardVisitor
public class BackupVisitor
extends java.lang.Object

Used by the backup listener for assigning the respective parameters of backup device like name, capacity, blocking factor and the position on the device. The device name is compulsory, for remaining parameters it can work with the default values.
